txt.en: 'Will you help me uncover this secret, [placeholder]? According to Glúrkub, this is the room from which Gorgar acquired the mithril hammer. Revealing this secret may help us understand why Hrímil Frost-heart so fears this weapon, and how we may use it against her.'
Talk to Durin and help him uncover the secret of Zul-mazal
Talk to Durin deep beneath Gundabad
'Then let us begin. This chamber will reveal its secrets to me!'
Durin believes that Zul-mazal holds some secret, and he is determined to learn what it may be.
'I can hardly believe it, [placeholder]. For how long has this secret stair remained hidden? And where does it lead?'
Durin is in Zul-mazal, determined to unravel whatever mystery lies within the curious chamber's walls.
Durin stands beside a secret stair deep beneath Gundabad, marvelling at the long-hidden passage.
